name: verdure leaves
notes:
**___**
**___**

<big><big><big>**verdure leaves**</big></big></big>
<big> looking at the leaves in this design, it reminds me of all the spring growth that is happening here in australia at the moment.  a wonderful time of year, full of fresh new growth.</big>

<big>these socks are lovely and simple while looking pretty and stylish.</big>

<big>they are worked toe up featuring a rounded wedge toe with heel flap and gusset.</big>

**___**
**___**

<big>**pattern information**</big>

<big>**sizing**</big>
a-56 (b-64, c-72, d-80) sts
finished circumference (approximately):
**gauge of 36 sts**:  15.5 (18, 20, 22) cm/6.25 (7, 8, 9) inches.
– to fit a foot circumference of 17 (20, 22, 24) cm/7 (7.75, 8.75, 10) inches.
**gauge of 32 sts**:  17.5 (20, 22.5, 25) cm/7 (8, 9, 9.75) inches.
– to fit a foot circumference of 19.5 (22, 25, 27.5) cm/7.75 (8.75, 10, 10.75) inches.

<big>**yarn**</big>
100g light fingering / fingering weight sock yarn.  solid, semi-solid or tonal colourways would work well for this design.

<big>**gauge**</big>  (worked in the round and measured after washing and laying flat to dry) 
36 sts = 10 cm/4 inches over stockinette stitch.
the sock fit is similar to a stockinette stitch sock.

<big>**needles**</big>  (for working small circumference in the round) 
2.25 mm/us1 needles (or size required to achieve gauge).

<big>**pattern formats** </big>
the instructions for the construction of the socks are written and the central panel is both charted and written.

**low vision accessible**
a low vision accessible version of this pattern are also available.
this version include 24 point arial all black text, no italics, no columns or tables and fully written instructions. there are charts included but the charts are not needed to complete the pattern.

<big>**thank you**</big>
thank you to peebs, yarnymama, mayellago, bells5r1, cailleach412 and other testers.

a huge thanks also to yarnymama and yalta for their ongoing valued advice, guidance, feedback and encouragement.
